description.narrative: Stakeholder - Customers: The Project will modernize obsolete tram network infrastructure to improve quality of service and urban mobility. The tram fleet renewal will introduce units that are compliant with best safety and accessibility standards and improve reliability of service that will benefit existing tram users. Environmental Effects: The Project will reduce the carbon footprint of the transport sector in Kryvyi Rih due to savings in energy consumption of the new tram fleet. Resilience: The project will increase urban transport resilience by tackling weaknesses that affect transport systems across Ukrainian cities and demonstrating ways of improving financial sustainability of municipal transport companies.

The Project seeks to provide long term financing to the municipal transport company of the City of Kryvyi Rih (City or KR), Shvidkisniy Tramway (ST or Municipal Company), to modernize the Citys rail system. The financing will be used to procure ~15 tram vehicles and rehabilitate 1.9km of associated tramway line. The Project is expected to be supported by the Clean Technology Fund (CTF).
